page.title: 14CARAVANNING IN KEWSTOKE
page.content: Although the majority of the caravan sites, containing some 550 static caravans and 36 touring pitches in Sand Bay and Kewstoke are south of this area, there is one field on which residential caravans are sited. This, with Pontins Holiday Camp, are the temporary homes for most of the holiday makers who visit the area. Caravans as places for holidays appeal to those who prefer a greater freedom than can be had in hotels or guest houses and also provide a greater contrast to their normal way of life. This type of holiday also appeals to parents with young children. More than half of one class at Kewstoke school had experienced a holiday in a caravan Without exception all enjoyed the experience..
